name: Renjā - "Time To Understand The Monster" - unofficial interactive music video
name_original: Renjā - "Time To Understand The Monster" - unofficial interactive music video
description:
An unofficial interactive music video to Renjā's song Time To Understand The Monster, from the album Kokoro.

Check out Renjā's music here:
https://renja.bandcamp.com/
https://dreamcatalogue.bandcamp.com/album/kokoro

Write words into the void and watch the mist eat them.

How to play:
Write words on your keyboard.
Listen to the music.
Press enter to pass your words into the mist.
The mist is a little different each time.

-

Made in GameMaker Studio 1.4, early 2017, in spare time during second year at Sunnhordland Folkehøgskole. Only exported to Windows. Inspired by the Kokoro album artwork.

Explanation: Clear Display Buffer With Window Colour is unchecked. Tinted cloud sprites with very low alpha are drawn on the screen. While typing, text is drawn on the gui layer. Pressing enter draws it once onto the display buffer which is slowly filled in by the cloud sprites.
